title: Small Farm Irrigation - Video 5 - Attaching and Plugging Drip Tape to a Lay Flat Header Pipe

tasks.task: Attaching drip tape to a header pipe and plugging the end
subtasks: Grasp fitting and twist to right
Punch hole in lay flat header with screwdriver
Confirm water flow while attaching fitting
Push fitting into hole, check for proper seating (pop sensation)
Prepare plug by cutting 1-2 inch piece from end
Fold cut piece over twice, then in half
Slide folded plug into cut end of tape
Turn on water to remove kinks and ensure proper flow
Securely place drip tape at desired location
Apply soil every foot along tape to weigh it down
